biotools.summary: An  algorithm  to  simulate  DNA  sequence  evolution  under  a  general  stochastic  model,  including  as  particular  cases  all  the  previously  used  schemes  of  nucleotide  substitution.

bioschemas.name: SDSE
bioschemas.summary: An  algorithm  to  simulate  DNA  sequence  evolution  under  a  general  stochastic  model,  including  as  particular  cases  all  the  previously  used  schemes  of  nucleotide  substitution.
